Have played through the game many times on a Xbox. No matter the platform it is a great game. I always seem to find something new. It is also fun to challenge yourself to be more efficient as well through the story mode not just challenge maps. Co op is fun and can lead to some laughs as well.

Tough to out-do Portal but Portal 2 does for sure.  Graphics are much improved and the "interactive fluids" add so much variety.
Great For single and Multiplayer, fun challenges for all different types of people. Great for Playing with ya mates.

It is a masterpiece with a really amusing concept! Both singleplayer and co-op are really fun to play and adding the chambers made by the community, it can offer you "infinite" hours of gaming. Totally recommend it. What are you waiting for?

Como diria Shrek ta bueno compralo, la verdad es que si es muy bueno pero si tienes amigos con quien jugar (manden soli si quieren jugar conmigo ya q no tengo amigos) y pues la verdad corre el juego con cualquier computadora esta muy bueno se los recomiendo al 100%

Perfect puzzle game even you don't like puzzle games this game with change that

Je vous présente mon jeu préféré! L'histoire est sympa, on peut passer des heures à résoudre les énigmes, et par dessus tout, l'humour est magique. J'adore. La campagne solo est très drôle et c'est encore plus rigolo en coop! Ce jeu nous propose deux campagnes différentes, une en solo et une en coop, donc toujours plus de puzzles! Bonne chance pour tout trouver sans tricher! C'est faisable, mais c'est très difficile! Si vous avez aimé le premier, vous allez adoré le second. Si vous avez adoré le second, ne perdez pas votre temps avec le premier, vous allez être déçus!
10/10 pour Portal 2.
this game is emersive and very poggers
semplicemente uno dei giochi più belli della storia dei videogiochi.
After putting this game on hold for years, I can finally say this is a great game.
Un poco mas largo de lo necesario, pero muy buena historia y genial continuación de un juegazo como es el Portal original.

i really dont know what to say. what a great game this is, considering it's TEN BUCKS too?!?! to be honest i'd expect a game like this from at least 40 bucks, but ten?!?! quality is so good, lore and storyline is just, amazing. if you have ten bucks and you don't know what to spend it on, buy this game! it could be hard, but overall this is my favorite game. considering it's from 2011 and it's graphics are king (i mean, it's valve, what bad game have they created, right?) i recently got into portal, and after finishing the first game, i bought this game and after beating chapter 1 i already knew this was my favorite game. dont get me wrong, the game is great, and the graphics are amazing. even my shitty computer from 2004 can run this perfectly with minor lag. buy the game if you're reading reviews to see if it's good, i tell ya it's a good game.
I personally enjoy Portal 2 more than the first one. The story is longer, the graphics are great, the mechanics are fun. Just a more flushed out game and very enjoyable. Also, co-op mode.
